name: Forgotten Throne (& Gravity)
description:
Forgotten Throne

is a story game about a main character who collects 4 keys/aspects/dragonballs/missions to fulfill their heart's mission: to return from their banished throne.

If that's an allegory to sin, to a previous innocence, to a lucky wish -- is for you to tell. This is a "fable stitcher", for solo or small group play that's guided by cards and expansive questions that help you find your own vein of this very old archetypal story. If there are parts of you that you want to fetch, this game might be the best window for your own Making. 

Gravity

is similarly an archtypal story about the story of coming together. Linguistically a lyric game, ontologically, maybe, a meditation of how we collapse into one another. 

---

if you enjoyed this game do consider donating an amount!
